title: Cant Reconnect to games
body:
Hey** Riot OCE team** just letting you know that your **game servers are down** at the moment and we **cannot join games**, let alone start one. Please fix soon otherwise my {{item:3070}} s will start like {{champion:32}} . Enjoy  your day and all the best with fixing the servers. Know you guys are probably on to it already.  

Thank you in advance
DUNKY! ~~~~ (Dunk them Donuts)

replies.body:
Lol.

Red activity here is nearly in the negative numbers.
